scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npm run build && wrangler pages dev public --kv SITE_CONFIG --kv AUTH_TOKENS --r2 IMAGES
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy public
scripts.kv:create: wrangler kv:namespace create SITE_CONFIG && wrangler kv:namespace create AUTH_TOKENS
